    • Use Case 01

get annotations for n samples from the selected compendium

Source: R/queries.R
get_sample_annotation.Rd

get annotations for n samples from the selected compendium

get_sample_annotation(compendium = "vespucci", n = 10)

Arguments

compendium

A string - the selected compendium
n

an integer: number of sample to retrieve (default 10)

Value

A data.frame with three columns: sampleId sampleName annotation

Examples

get_sample_annotation(n=25)
#>               sampleId      sampleName
#> 1  U2FtcGxlVHlwZTozMjAw GSM2627902.ch1
